title: hugeblack
author: hugeblack
created_time: August 31, 2023, 02:23:03 PMLast edit: June 14, 2024, 11:29:23 AM by hugeblack
content: Rules: - Local boards only. - Maximum 5 links. - Only topics/replies with 0 Merits. - You can participate once per month*. - No Alt account/s. - Don't spam - Don't write me in PM -  You can add posts made by others (1 to 3 links only)* Please follow the format belowCode:Link 1:Link 2:Link 3:Link 5:Link 5:* I am not strict about the 30-day rule. The main goal is to fairly distribute my merits, but if you have high-quality posts, you can share them even before the 30-day period. If I notice abuse or your posts are not that quality and keep spamming this topic, I will put you on my ignore list + negative trust.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.created_time: September 01, 2023, 12:02:15 PMLast edit: May 21, 2024, 09:05:29 AM by hugeblack

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on September 01, 2023, 12:02:15 PMI apologize to everyone for deleting their posts, I forgot to save some reserved posts, I am so sorry, but I have read all your posts and these responses to them.Apology accepted!So can those of us whose post had already been deleted repost their LB posts links again? It will be good they are also given equal opportunity as others. I have already sent you a PM about my deleted post cause I was very concerned about what I might have done wrong in relation to the rules of the thread before I got to see this comment from you.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Lida93 on September 01, 2023, 12:42:16 PMSo can those of us whose post had already been deleted repost their LB posts links again? It will be good they are also given equal opportunity as others. I have already sent you a PM about my deleted post cause I was very concerned about what I might have done wrong in relation to the rules of the thread before I got to see this comment from you.Merits were sent and comments were left here next to each user who shared links.Please, next time, share links, and if there is a comment, it should be at the end of the link.You are allowed to create a new post after 1/10/2023, that is, a month from now.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote- Add only topics/replies with 0 merits.hugeblack - Let me give some assumptions and opinions about the terms and conditions above.Some posts with 0 merit [regardless of writing date] may be posts/topics that may have been ignored by local board merit source or may also be posts/topics that have no quality at all. Some posts with 2 - 5 merit may still deserve get more merit because of their quality, but will there be any exceptions to that?Let's be honest - I'd love to hear your opinion, hugeblack.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: 1. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5449314.msg62111656#msg621116562. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5261214.msg62615604#msg626156043. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460859.msg62604369#msg626043694. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460488.msg62702655#msg627026555. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457645.msg62469474#msg624694746. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441320.msg61826960#msg618269607. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5447392.msg62093055#msg620930558. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5436174.msg61635944#msg616359449. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5432826.msg61541243#msg6154124310. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5452842.msg62343910#msg62343910Being a neutral merit source for the entire local boards wouldn't be an easy one except you just intend sending the merits based on length of post because I couldn't even imagine the stress and work you'll be going through if you intend using a translator for your review.Goodluck and this thread is a nice move to encourage local boardsThank you.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Merit LogAbout ~60 Merit have been sent Thanks @Gencecikmen You provided good links,  +4 merits for u.@Mate2237 and Onyeeze thanks Code:Stable090   -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,Compromise me   -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,Mate2237   -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts, I like you add other postsOnyeeze   -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts, I like you add other postsGencecikmen    -------------> 2/10/2023 Amazing, thanks +4 Merit for uAgbamoni   -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,Nalain420    -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,RockBell   -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,Dr.Bitcoin_Strange  -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,2Pizza410000BTC  -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,Obari -------------> 2/10/2023 Good posts,Quote from: _BlackStar on September 01, 2023, 08:15:18 PMSome posts with 0 merit [regardless of writing date] may be posts/topics that may have been ignored by local board merit source or may also be posts/topics that have no quality at all. Some posts with 2 - 5 merit may still deserve get more merit because of their quality, but will there be any exceptions to that?Generally I don't have a problem with that but many tend to send Merits to posts that have already received Merits, If you check your account, you will find that any post that has earned +1 merits, there is a high probability that you will get more for the same post. So I'm looking for posts with zero merits to encourage others.
